name: Estonian Trade Union Confederation
membership: The EAKL is full member of the ETUC.
goal: The Estonian Trade Union Confederation is the national roof organisation for Estonian trade unions. It unites 18 sectoral trade union federations in health care, transport, public services, trade and commerce, industry etc sectors.
euInitiatives: We are as national trade union roof organisation represented in management boards of all tripartite European level bodies (Eurofound, EU-OSHA, CEDEFOP), and in all tripartite advisory committees to European Commission.
